Shirley_Myers:
{{Use dmy dates|date=September 2020}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Shirley Myers | image = | image_size = | background = solo_singer | origin = [[New Brunswick]], Canada | instrument = | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer-songwriter | years_active = 1997–present | label = [[Stony Plain Records|Stony Plain]] | website = [http://www.shirleymyers.com/ www.shirleymyers.com] }} '''Shirley Myers''' is a Canadian [[country music]] singer-songwriter. Signed to [[Stony Plain Records]] in the 1990s, she released her debut album, ''[[Let It Rain (Shirley Myers album)|Let It Rain]]'', in 1997. The first single, the title track, reached the top five of the ''[[RPM (magazine)|RPM]]'' Country Singles chart in Canada. Myers was nominated for a [[Juno Award]] for [[Juno Award for Country Recording of the Year|Best Country Female Vocalist]] in 1998. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:18em;"| Details !
